subject: Vanpool Eligibility Review - VP-101 - Action Required

messages.body:
Dear VP-101 Vanpool Members,

As part of our routine vanpool program review, we are verifying the eligibility of all participants. Our records indicate a potential discrepancy with one or more rider addresses.

Please confirm your current home address and work site assignment by replying to this email within 5 business days.

If your address has changed recently, please provide your updated information.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Pool Patrol Team

Hi,

I received your email about the vanpool review. I should mention that I recently moved to Houston for family reasons but I'm still commuting to Austin for work. I stay with a friend during the week.

Is this going to be a problem for the vanpool?

Bob Johnson

subject: Vanpool Eligibility Review - VP-102 - Action Required

messages.body:
Dear VP-102 Vanpool Members,

We are conducting a review of vanpool eligibility. Our records show that one or more participants may have an address that is outside the typical service area.

Please confirm your current home address by replying to this email.

Thank you,
Pool Patrol Team

Hello,

I apologize for the confusion. My address in your system is outdated. I moved from Dallas to Cedar Park three months ago but forgot to update my records.

My new address is: 456 Lakeline Blvd, Cedar Park, TX 78613

Please update my information. I'm much closer to the plant now.

Thanks,
Frank Miller

Hi Frank,

Thank you for the update. We have noted your new address in Cedar Park. Your vanpool eligibility has been confirmed.

No further action is needed.

Best regards,
Pool Patrol Team

subject: Vanpool Eligibility Review - VP-106 - Action Required

messages.body:
Dear VP-106 Vanpool Members,

We are reviewing vanpool program eligibility. Please confirm your current home address and work schedule.

Reply to this email within 5 business days.

Thank you,
Pool Patrol Team

I don't understand why I'm being reviewed. I've been on this vanpool for 2 years without any issues. My address is the same as it's always been. This feels like harassment.

Xavier

Hi Xavier,

Thank you for your response. This is a routine review conducted for all vanpool participants, not targeted at any individual.

Our records show your address is in San Antonio (78201), which is approximately 52 miles from the San Marcos Distribution Hub. We want to ensure this commute arrangement still works for you.

Could you please confirm this is still your current situation?

Best regards,
Pool Patrol Team

Dear VP-103 Vanpool Members,

We noticed that the vanpool departure time (6:30 AM) may not align with your shift start times (8:00 AM). This creates a 90-minute gap.

Please let us know if the current schedule works for you or if adjustments are needed.

Thank you,
Pool Patrol Team

Hi,

Yes, we've been meaning to bring this up. The early departure doesn't match our shifts anymore since we moved to the 8 AM start time last month.

Can we adjust the vanpool to depart at 7:15 AM instead?

Thanks,
Henry Taylor (on behalf of VP-103 riders)

Dear VP-103 Members,

Good news! Your vanpool schedule has been adjusted. Starting Monday, January 15th, VP-103 will depart at 7:15 AM.

Please confirm you've received this update.

Best regards,
Pool Patrol Team

Dear VP-107 Vanpool Members,

We are conducting a routine eligibility review. Please confirm your current home address.

Thank you,
Pool Patrol Team

Hi,

My address is 100 Innovation Way, Georgetown, TX 78626. I live about 3 miles from the Georgetown Tech Campus.

Let me know if you need anything else.

Brian Green

subject: Vanpool Schedule Mismatch - VP-108 - Action Required

messages.body:
Dear VP-108 Vanpool Members,

Our records show that your shift schedule (Wednesday-Saturday, 12:00 PM - 8:00 PM) may not align with the VP-108 vanpool schedule (Monday-Friday).

Please clarify your current work schedule and vanpool needs.

Thank you,
Pool Patrol Team

Hi Pool Patrol Team,

You're right that our shifts are Wed-Sat. We only use the vanpool on Wed, Thu, and Fri. On Saturdays, we carpool separately since the van doesn't run.

Is there a Saturday option we could join instead?

Thanks,
Gina Carter

Dear VP-111 Vanpool Members,

We are reviewing eligibility for your vanpool. Our records indicate one participant may have an address that requires verification.

Please confirm your current home address.

Thank you,
Pool Patrol Team

Hello,

My address is 333 Factory Ln, Bastrop, TX 78602. Yes, it's about 35 miles from the plant, but the vanpool route passes through Bastrop on the way to Austin.

The driver picks me up at 6:15 AM and I'm at the plant by 6:50 AM. It's been working great for 8 months.

Please don't remove me from the vanpool. This is my only affordable commute option.

Vince Reed

Dear VP-112 Vanpool Members,

This is a routine quarterly verification. Please reply to confirm your current address and that you're still actively using the vanpool.

Thank you,
Pool Patrol Team

Confirmed. Address: 100 Research Way, Cedar Park, TX 78613. Still using VP-112 daily.

-Zoe

Confirmed. 200 Dev Dr, Leander, TX 78641. Active rider.

Adam

Hi, confirming: 300 Prototype Pkwy, Austin, TX 78750. Yes, I use the vanpool Mon-Fri.

Bella

400 Test Terrace, Round Rock, TX 78681. All good here.

Charlie

Dear VP-112 Members,

Thank you for your prompt responses. Your vanpool eligibility has been verified for Q1 2024.

No further action is needed.

Best regards,
Pool Patrol Team
